description.en:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!

description.de:
Nach einem Leben voller Blutvergießen und Kummer wird die große Kaiserin Martina wiedergeboren als Astina, geniale Tochter eines bescheidenen Grafen. Aber ihre friedliche Welt zerbricht, als der Bankrott der Familie ihren Vater dazu zwingt, sie an den gefährlichen Erzherzog Atalenta zu verheiraten. Dieser ist in der feinen Gesellschaft bekannt als „Terriod die Bestie“, weil er durch einen Familienfluch in ein wildes Monster verwandelt wurde. Glücklicherweise ist selbst die tödliche Bestie von Atalenta dem mächtigen Schwert der ehemaligen Kaiserin nicht gewachsen. Alle sind geschockt, als die neue Erzherzogin ihren Ehemann kurzerhand zähmt und zum Familienoberhaupt wird. Niemand ist jedoch mehr überrascht als Astina selbst, als ein einfacher Kuss Terriod zurück in einen Menschen verwandelt. Er ähnelt nicht nur ihrem Liebhaber aus ihrem vergangenen Leben, sondern hat auch noch keinerlei Erinnerungen an sie von seiner Zeit als Bestie. Kann sich dieses mächtige Paar trotz der unangenehmen Umstände zusammentun und über das Erzherzogtum herrschen?

---

description.en:
100 years after her death, Empress Martina, the founder of the Carabella Empire, reincarnates as Astina Lette, the daughter of a count. Her peaceful, everyday life as a noble lady, a stark contrast to her past life, is short-lived, however.

With the bankruptcy of her father's failed trade business, her family falls into great debt. Astina decides to sell herself off to marry Grand Duke Thereode in place of her sister Kanna to save her family from their financial crisis. But Thereode is forever cursed to take on the form of a beast, and no one expects her to survive the night with him…

Still, defying all odds, she fights the beast with her impressive swordsmanship, and miraculously survives. Over time, a slow relationship begins to kindle between them as she tames him as her pet.

---
Following a life of bloodshed and heartbreak, the great Empress Martina is reborn as Astina, the genius daughter of a humble count. But her peaceful world is shattered when bankruptcy forces her father to marry her off to the dangerous Archduke Atalenta. All of high society knows him as "Theriod the Beast" because of a family curse that turned him into a wild monster. Luckily, even the deadly beast of Atalenta is no match for the former empress's mighty sword. 

Everyone is shocked when the new archduchess tames her husband all too easily and takes over as the family head. No one's more surprised than Astina, however, when her casual kiss returns Theriod to his human form. Not only does he resemble her past life lover, but he has no memory of her from his wolf days. Despite these awkward circumstances, can the new power couple join hands to rule over the archduchy?

---

description.fr:
Après une vie ponctuée de massacres et de trahisons, l'impératrice Martina se réincarne dans le corps d'Astina, de longues années plus tard. Seulement, cette fois aussi, sa vie ne sera pas de tout repos, puisqu'après que leur père a fait faillite, la sœur d'Astina est mariée de force à l'archiduc Atalenta, un homme victime d'une terrible malédiction le transformant en monstre. Astina décide alors de prendre la place de la jeune Kanna, et affronte sans mal la bête terrifiante qu'est devenu l'archiduc. Elle n'en reste pas moins surprise d'arriver à gérer la situation avec tant de facilité, et l'est encore plus lorsqu'un simple baiser de sa part finit par rendre son apparence à l'archiduc, qui en plus de ressembler étrangement à l'homme donc Martina était amoureuse, n'a plus aucun souvenir d'elle lorsqu'il était un loup. Malgré cette situation on ne peut plus étrange, vont-ils réussir à maintenir l'ordre dans le duché et à régner main dans la main?

---

description.ko:
제국의 시조였던 전설적인 인물 마티나의 죽음으로부터 백 년 후,
마티나는 귀족가의 일개 여식인 아스티나로 환생한다.

전생과 다른 평화로운 일상은 잠시,
아버지의 파산으로 인해 아스티나는
야수의 형상을 한 테리오드 대공에게로 팔려 간다.

“급소를 쳐서 기절시켰어요.”
“기…… 절시키셨다고요?”

하룻밤에 죽어 나갈 것이라는 모두의 예상과 달리
그녀는 화려한 검술로 괴물 테리오드를 제압해
애완동물로 길들이기 시작한다.

“테오, 앉아.”
“컹!”

달빛이 아름다운 어느 밤,
자신을 잘 따르는 테리오드가 기특해
아스티나는 그에게 짧게 입을 맞춰 주는데……

“……테오?”

아스티나의 애완동물이……
사람이 됐다?

결핍된 괴물 남편과 무심한 아내의 본격 조련 로맨스!

description.ru:
Спустя сотню лет после смерти Мартины — основательницы империи, легенда переродилась в теле Астины — одной из дочерей аристократической семьи. Ее мирная повседневная жизнь, так отличавшаяся от предыдущей, оборвалась в тот миг, когда обанкротившийся отец продал ее звероподобному эрцгерцогу Териоту. Но вопреки многочисленным ожиданиям, что девушка, встретившись с чудовищем, в одночасье погибнет, благодаря своему исключительному мастерству владения мечом Астина победила монстра и приручила его, словно домашнего питомца…

description.uk:
Через 100 років після смерті, імператриця Мартіна, засновниця імперії Карабелла, перевтілюється в Астіну Летте, дочку графа. Однак її мирне повсякденне життя благородної дами, що різко контрастує з її минулим життям, є недовгим.

Після банкрутства невдалого торгового бізнесу її батька, її родина потрапляє у великі борги. Астіна вирішує продати себе, щоб вийти заміж за великого герцога Тереоду, замість своєї сестри Канни, щоб врятувати свою сім'ю від фінансової кризи. Але Тереода назавжди проклятий мати образ звіра, і ніхто не очікує, що вона переживе ніч з ним...

However, her true nature combines courage and compassion, making her an exceptional person. She is arranged to be engaged to the second prince, Gilbert, who is rumored to have a difficult and improper character. A flawless and perfect duke's daughter and a lonely, clumsy prince cursed with red eyes.
description.ja: 『美しい人形（ベル・プペー）』のあだ名を持つ、公爵令嬢レティシア。儚げな容姿とは裏腹に、その本性は包容力と豪胆さを兼ね備えた屈指のスパダリであった。そんな彼女が、素行に難ありと噂される第二皇子ジルベールと婚約することになり――。無謬のスパダリ令嬢と、孤独で不器用な呪われし赤目の皇子。

description.en: Celestine, the villainess, suddenly recalls her memories of her past life when she's at the altar, about to be married off to a Prime Minister twice her age and surrounded by the most awful rumours as a punishment for her misdeeds against the Prince and his lover. She realizes that this is the world of an otome game she played in that previous life, but more importantly than that, she also inherits past life's very specific tastes...
description.ja: 王子に捨てられた美貌の悪役令嬢セレスティーヌ。醜い禿げデブオヤジといやがらせ婚の最中……突然よみがえる前世の記憶…！ そして…あれ!? でもなんかこの人…悪くない。ちょっと素敵かも……？ 悪女として、そして枯れ専として、我が道を行くセレスティーヌの華道をご覧あれ！
description.pt: Celestine, a vilã, de repente se lembra de suas memórias de sua vida passada quando ela está no altar, prestes a se casar com um primeiro-ministro com o dobro de sua idade e cercada pelos mais terríveis rumores como punição por seus crimes contra o príncipe e seu amante. Ela percebe que este é o mundo de um jogo otome que ela jogou naquela vida anterior, mas mais importante do que isso, ela também herda gostos muito específicos da vida passada…

description.en: Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?
description.ja: 私立廻蘭女学院中学。そこは孤児院出身の子どもたちのみが通う、歴史と伝統ある寄宿学校。この学校には古くから、生徒たちへ個々の目標に沿った【役柄】を与えるという特殊な制度があった。心優しい少女・志村花子は「学校中のみんなと友達になる」ことを目標に入学すると、いきなりとんでもない課題を与えられてしまい――！？クセ強めなクラスメイトたちに囲まれて「愛人作り」はできるのか！？

The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!

description.en: When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game's character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story's most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags! Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
description.fr: Lorsqu'il reprend ses esprits, Hirasawa Kazuki, un étudiant universitaire normal, se retrouve en possession du corps du personnage d'un jeu. De plus, c'est Harold Stokes, le personnage le plus détesté de l'histoire, qui a même été baptisé 『Roi des connards』par les joueurs. L'histoire est un terrain miné qui n'attend que lui pour exploser ! Harold pourra-t-il se dégager un chemin de survie tout en évitant les innombrables "mines" de l'histoire ? Des myriades de mines attendent qu’il les écrase, comme des drapeaux de mort (Game Over)!
description.ja: 普通の大学生、平沢一希は気が付くと自身がやり込んだゲーム『Brave Hearts』の悪役キャラ、ハロルド・ストークスに憑依していた。 このままゲームのシナリオが消化されていくといずれ主人公たちに倒され死んでしまう！？ 作中でも屈指の強さを誇るハロルドの肉体とゲームの 知識で盛りだくさんの死亡フラグを回避してつかみ取れるか生存ルート！？

altTitles.ja: 刃牙らへん

description.en: Following his battle with Nomi no Sukune the 2nd, Baki's half-brother, Jack Hanma challenges the warriors of the underground arena to take on his original fighting style of "Goudou": The way of Biting! Fascinated by Jack's relentless pursuit of more strength, the warriors clash against Jack and his fearsome style. Just what will be the outcome of this blood-ridden contest of purity?
description.ru: Продолжение великой эпопеи "Баки". 6-я номерная серия тайтла, которая поведает нам нереальную историю сражения Джека Хаммера и доисторического человека Пикла!!!
description.tr: Büyük destan Bucky'nin devamı. Jack Hammer ve tarih öncesi adam Pickle arasındaki savaşın gerçek dışı hikayesini anlatacak olan Baki'nin 6 numaralı serisidir!!!
description.pt-br: Jack derrubou o mundo do sumô, agora ele irá desafiar a todos para seu torneio. Desta vez uma nova jornada.

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kokinya Nobunaga

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

altTitles.ja: 信長のシェフ

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

altTitles.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

description.en:
An old man is forced to retire from the adventurer's guild and decides to return to his hometown. On his way, he picks up two babies; the first one is a human baby with the emblem of a hero, and the second was a baby of the demon tribe with the emblem of the demon king.  And so the story of the old man who picked up the hero and the demon king begins.

altTitles.en: The Forsaken Saintess and Her Foodie Roadtrip in Another World

description.en:
Rin Takanashi, a caregiver in her thirties, was unceremoniously discarded as "trash" despite being summoned as a saint.

However, as a lover of the great outdoors and all things camping, she was blessed with a special skill, [Survival], as well as another unique skill! Thus, a riveting tale begins: one of sweat, tears, and insatiable hunger as Rin, together with companions she picked up along the way, leisurely explores this parallel world and savours gourmet cuisine to her heart's content…

Or so the story should have gone, but it looks like their road is going in an unexpected direction…?

altTitles.en: The Wolf can't Hide His Affection

description.en:
This is a world where humans and beast people coexist. The helpful leopard, Tomoru, and the wolf, Hibiki, who goes at his own pace, are childhood friends who live together. One day, Tomoru is told by Hibiki that he likes him, and their relationship changes!!! Tomorou, who realizes he thinks of Hibiki as more than family, accepts his confession, and the two of them start dating.
However, Hibiki changes into his beast form whenever he gets excited. How will he skillfully make out now they're lovers...?!

One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo ha Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

altTitles.en: The Song that Transcends This World

description.en: During troubled times, Weng Shaoying is one of the most famous singers in Dongping. Many people go to Song of Fairyland just to see her perform. However, under her glamorous facade, she has been controlled for more than 10 years. On the other side of Dongping is Bi Xing Tang, one of the most famous gangs there. After her father’s death, Yanchu became the young female leader of Bi Xing Tang, which caused a lot of rumors to spread. On one inevitably fortuitous night, the two happened to meet. At that time, neither of them knew that they would eventually become the most important person in the other’s life. Starting from that night onwards, the gears in Shaoying and Yanchu’s fate will forever be rotating together.

description.en:
Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert... I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat... ahem, heroes!

description.ja: 野盗に村を襲われたリンは、窮地の中、１本の剣を手にする。その剣は英雄・ジークフリートの魂が宿った魔剣で、リンは圧倒的な力で野盗たちを制圧する。だが、リンの股間にはもう１本の凶悪な“剣”がそそり立っていて…!?
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

description.en:
A student at the magic school, Alto, who was on the verge of repeating the school year, accidentally found a book that activated a magic circle, and as a result, summoned the sealed devil Vermeil! Vermeil is a very unhealthy older sister with a power devastating enough to be called a disaster!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/91)
description.es: Alto, un estudiante de una escuela de magia que estaba a punto de reprobar, invoco a un demonio sellado: Vermeil, como resultado de la activación de un circulo mágico dentro de un libro que encontró por accidente. Vermeil es una hermana mayor muy seductora con un poder tan grande que se puede decir que es una ¡¿calamidad?! ¡El mago camina con el monstruo mágico más fuerte que existe!
description.ja: 留年の危機に瀕していた魔法学校の生徒・アルトは偶然見つけた本の魔法陣を発動させた結果、封印されていた悪魔・ヴェルメイを召喚してしまった！ヴェルメイは厄災ともいえる強大な力を持つ、大変不健全なお姉さんで!? 崖っぷち魔術師が最強の使い魔と歩む王道ファンタジー開幕!!
description.ru: Ученик школы магии Альто, который был на грани того, чтобы остатся на второй учебный год, случайно нашел книгу, которая активировала магический круг, и в результате вызвал запечатанного дьявола Вермеила! Вермеил-очень нездоровая старшая сестра с силой, достаточно разрушительной, чтобы ее можно было назвать катастрофой! Ученик мага идет бок о бок с самым сильным существом на свете!!
description.vi: Một học sinh tại trường phép thuật, Alto, đối mặt với nguy cơ học lại, tình cờ tìm thấy một cuốn sách triệu hổi cũ, và đã triệu hồi ác quỷ bị phong ấn Vermeil!

description.en:
Negi is an illustrator, and Tanu is a career woman.

The two are a female couple. ♪

"I wonder what it means to love someone?"
"Am I weird or something?"

While Tanu was struggling with these worries, she met Negi through a hobby.
Meanwhile, Negi had been interested in Tanu ever since they first met.

After a long-distance relationship, they are now living together, and their dream is, of course, same-sex marriage!
Why not take a peek into the lives of these lovey-dovey girls
through this non-fiction four-panel comic?

Wakaba-chan Wants to Make It Clear

description.en:
Four-eyes who's bad with girls is only able to talk to with his tomboyish childhood friend Wakaba. But one day Wakaba appears before him in an amazingly cute outfit...!? 

This is a battle rom-com between Wakaba who wants to be loved and four-eyes who gets flustered by girls!!
description.ja: 『絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男』の紺吉が贈るTwitter発ラブコメが、新連載開始！　女子が苦手な男子高校生のメガネくんは幼馴染のボーイッシュ女子・若葉とだけは会話ができる。でもある日、若葉がとびきり可愛い服装で現れて…!?　メガネくんに好かれたい若葉さんと女子にドキマギしちゃうメガネくんとのすれ違い＆攻防戦ラブコメ!!

description.en: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!
description.ja: 堕落した悪魔たちにやる気を出させるため悪魔たちのアイドルとなる人間を捜しに人間界に降りてきた阿久津雅虎。彼は早くもアイドル候補・天音リリーを見つけ勧誘する。しかし、リリーの正体は阿久津たち悪魔の天敵の「天使」で!? 自らの身と仲間を守るためリリーを堕天させんとする阿久津と野望のため阿久津の更正を決意する
description.pt: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe - todo o caminho desde o Inferno, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!
description.pt-br: Masatora Akutsu acabou de ser transferido para uma turma ni Japão de muito muito longe -todo o caminho desde o Infernio, para ser exato. Akutsu é um demônio que veio à Terra para encontrar alguém que possa motivar as forças do Inferno a contra atacar o exército invasor do Paraíso. Ele imediatamente coloca os olhos em um dos seus colegas, a gentil e bonita Lily Amane, mas acaba sendo muito para ele aguentar quando acaba descobrindo que a Lily tem alguns segredos dela mesmo!

description.en: A company drone who died from overworking was reincarnated as Sawadi, the third son of a merchant in a different world. His cheat skill is restoration magic and support magic. With these cheat skills, he came up with a new business model where he used his restoration magic to cure cheap slaves and made them earn money for him. Although his earnings are steadily increasing, he also has to suffer the consequence of getting his workload also increased... Will Sawadi ever be able to live leisurely without working?
description.ja:
社畜として過労死した男が、異世界の商家の三男・サワディとして転生した。得意としているのは再生魔法と支援魔法。彼はそのチートな性能の魔法を使った新たな商売の種を思いつく。再生魔法で安い奴隷たちを治療して、お金を稼いでもらうことにしたのだ。順調に稼ぎは増えていくが、自業自得で自分の仕事も増えていってしまい……。果たして、サワディは働かずに、のんびり暮らすことができるようになるのか？　ゆるふわファンタジー、ここに開幕！

description.en:
Murong Qian, a fortune teller, foresees a disaster threatening his family. In a bid to save them, he aims to seduce the prince and gain power, only to discover that Prince He Cangxiao has a deadly fear of men. Yet, caught in the intoxicating allure of desire’s flowers, they share a night of passion. Now, torn between fear and lust, He Cangxiao can't stop craving Murong Qian. A whirlwind of pleasure ensues, engulfing them for a thousand and one nights!

description.en: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!
description.ja: 南川さんは隣の席の高森くんの「ヒミツ」を知っている。それは高森くんの心の声が聞こえるということ。そしてさらに、高森くんは南川さんのことが大好きだということ…!!毎日毎日うるさい高森くんの心の声を黙らせられるのか…!?テレパス青春ラブコメ、開幕です!!
description.vi: Một cô gái có khả năng đọc suy nghĩ người khác và cậu bạn kế bên có máu simp lỏ. Điều gì sẽ chờ đợi cả hai phía trước?

description.en: The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where "a maid sells jewels". Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.
description.ja: 宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。きらめく宝石を手にしたとき、彼らの人生もまた輝きだす。

altTitles.ja: カッコいい女の子と12センチの約束

altTitles.ja-ro: Kakkoi Onnanoko to 12 cm no Yakusoku

altTitles.en: A Cool Girl and a 12cm Promise

altTitles.es-la: Una chica genial y una promesa de 12 cm

altTitles.vi: Lời hứa 12cm với cô gái ngầu lòi

description.en: Tomoaki Kanba admired his boyish childhood friend, Ibuki Tachibana, and promised to become "more cool" than her.However, four years have passed, and Ibuki has grown up to be an even more handsome girl! Their relationship is as unchanged as a 12cm height difference that cannot be filled...?The curtain rises on a pure love story about a cool girl who is sorely in love with a boy who wants to be cool!---Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.
description.ja:
椛 智明(かんば ともあき)はボーイッシュな幼なじみ、立華 一颯(たちばな いぶき)に憧れ、彼女より「もっとカッコよくなる」と約束をする。

しかし４年が経ち、一颯はさらに超イケメン女子に成長!! 二人の関係は埋まらない12センチの身長差と同じく、変わらない…？

カッコいい女の子が、カッコよくなりたい男の子にきゅんとするピュアなラブストーリーの幕開け━━。

altTitles.th: แปลงโฉมเธอจนเจอรัก

description.en: After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love, she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school, she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange, she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?

altTitles.ja: 廻天のアルバス

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaiten no Albus

description.en:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late.

The Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed Hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

The Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
description.ja: 魔王を倒した。世界は平和に。でも、間に合わなかった。なぜかこの冒険を繰り返している勇者アルバスは、急ぎたい。これは世界を救う物語であり、そして――
description.vi:
Ma vương đã bị đánh bại... Thế giới sẽ hòa bình trở lại. Nhưng... Đã quá muộn rồi... Anh hùng Albus thật sự đang rất vội. Câu chuyện tua ngược, như thể một cách tự nhiên, trở lại nơi mọi chuyện khởi đầu.

Người anh hùng đầy hiểu biết Albus với đôi mắt lờ đờ như thiếu ngủ, dấn thân vào một cuộc phiêu lưu mới, nơi “thời gian là thứ quan trọng nhất”.

Được đăng dài kỳ trên Weekly Shounen Sunday, nơi đã đăng tải siêu phẩm “Thám tử lừng danh Conan”, người Anh hùng Albus tìm cách giành lại tương lai mà anh ấy mong muốn từ quá khứ trong thế giới fantasy “speedrun” một cách đúng nghĩa này!
description.es-la: El Rey Demonio es derrotado... El mundo está en paz. Pero fue demasiado tarde... El héroe Albus tiene prisa. La historia da vueltas y comienza de nuevo desde el principio, como si fuera algo natural. ¡Esta es una fantasía de re-aventura de alta velocidad donde "el tiempo es lo más importante" para el experto héroe Albus.

title.en: Saki-chan wa Konya mo Peko Peko

altTitles.ja: サキちゃんは今夜もぺこぺこ

altTitles.es-la: Saki la súcubo está hambrienta esta noche

description.en: Saki-chan is a beautiful young woman and just a little naive. She may seem harmless as she wanders the streets, but beware–she’s a brand-new succubus who thrives on the lust of men! She’s just…not very good at it yet. When she finds herself with an opportunity to move in with a 30-something man who’s never slept with a woman before, she takes it, just like she’ll take him! Er, eventually. This sweet and sexy comedy about a novice sex demon and her virgin partner will leave you satisfied but always hungry for more.
description.id: Saki adalah gadis yang cantik dan sedikit polos. Dia mungkin tampak tak berbahaya ketika berada di jalan, namun sesungguhnya dia adalah succubus baru yang mencari nafsu laki-laki! Dia… belum bagus dalam hal itu. Akhirnya dia punya kesempatan untuk tinggal bersama laki-laki umur 30-an yang masih perjaka. Ini adalah cerita komedi yang manis dan seksi antara demon seks pemula dan rekan perjakanya yang akan membuatmu puas dan meminta lebih. Dijamin!
description.ja: アパートの前で行き倒れていた巨乳×天然系美少女は、ウブでピュアな新米サキュバスだった！？　彼女は精を吸収しなければならない困った体質で同居することになったオーバー30の童貞男子には、うれしくもキビしー状況に！！
description.es-la: Saki-chan es una joven hermosa y un poco ingenua. Puede parecer inofensiva mientras deambula por las calles, pero ten cuidado: ¡es una súcubo novata que se nutre de la lujuria de los hombres! Aunque todavía no es muy buena en el negocio. Cuando se encuentra con la oportunidad de mudarse con un hombre de treinta y tantos años que nunca antes se había acostado con una mujer, no puede desperdiciarla.

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

altTitles.vi: Người đàn ông không thể ly hôn CASE 2

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!
description.es-la: La Segunda Parte de Un Divorcio Imposible, nos cuenta la casi imposible vida de nuestro protagonista "Takeshi Nagase" que tras una noche en la que perdio el conocimiento por culpa de una actriz malvada queda envuelto en un caso de supuesta violación y es alejado de sus hijos. ¡¿Una lucha por demostrar que es inocente?!

altTitles.ja-ro: Yoroizuka-san wo Baburasetai

altTitles.ja: 鎧塚さんをバブらせたい

description.en: Kurumi is a shy and easily embarrassed high school girl with a strong imagination. Her girlfriend is a cool, iron-faced office worker, Ms. Yoroizuka, who doesn't show much emotion. In order to get the older woman to indulge in her, Kurumi tries all sorts of things to spoil Ms. Yoroizuka, but...?

altTitles.ja-ro: Konjiki no Gash!!

altTitles.ja: 金色のガッシュ!!

description.en:
Every 1000 years, 100 demon children are sent to Earth to compete in a battle to become king of the Demon World. Each demon is paired with a human partner who is given a spell book of a specific color. The human can cast the demon's spells through their book. If a demon's book is burned, they disappear and return to the Demon World. The last demon remaining becomes the king. The show is oriented around Gash Bell and his human partner, Takamine Kiyomaro.  
  
---
- **Won the 48th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**
description.pt-br:
Takamine Kiyomaro é um estudante gênio do ensino médio, muito convencido e que vê todos os outros como inferiores. Ele se fecha para o resto da escola, sendo um excluso por opção. Um dia, um estranho garotinho loiro invade sua casa trazendo consigo um livro vermelho e uma carta de seu pai. O rapaz descobre que o nome do garoto é Gash e que ele perdeu a memória, então seu pai lhe pede para cuidar do menino.

Muito irritado com a inesperada responsabilidade, Kiyomaro volta sua atenção para o estranho livro, também mencionado na carta de seu pai, que possui letras estranhas de cor azul, as quais ele não consegue entender. Folheando o curioso objeto o rapaz encontra palavras escritas em vermelho, e apesar de estarem em uma língua que ele nunca viu, consegue lê-las como se estivesse em japonês, e ao pronunciar as palavras vermelhas "Zakeru", um estranho relâmpago é então atirado da boca de Gash, como se fosse um raio, porém, o garotinho perde a consciência ao atirá-lo, não entendendo como o quarto de seu anfitrião parecia ter sido explodido de uma hora para outra.

Com o desenrolar da história Kiyomaro conhece outro humano com um livro e uma criança, que por sua vez revela que os estranhos garotos não passam de crianças demônios, que estão competindo em um torneio para decidir quem será o próximo rei de seu mundo. Os livros representam os feitiços que cada criança pode usar para lutar, e explicam também que uma criança demônio não pode usar seus poderes sozinho no mundo humano; eles precisam primeiro procurar por um parceiro que possa ler seus livros e comandar seus feitiços em batalha.

Para derrotar um oponente, basta queimar o livro do adversário e ele será mandado de volta para o mundo dos demônios. Depois de ponderar muito o rapaz decide ajudar Gash a recuperar sua memória e a  lutar nessa guerra contra os outros 99 demônios para torná-lo o próximo rei. Descobrindo pelo caminho o valor individual de cada pessoa, Kiyomaro irá relembrar sentimentos há muito tempo enterrados e o valor de uma verdadeira amizade.

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

altTitles.ja: 双子と双子

altTitles.ja-ro: Futago to Futago

title.en: With My Price Deduction System, I Became Invincible

altTitles.ja: 物価下落システムで無双する

altTitles.en: Dominating with the Price Collapse System

description.en:
The protagonist, Yuuto Matsushima, is an ordinary young man working multiple jobs to save money for his future spouse. One day, by a twist of fate, he accidentally activates a mysterious “system.” This system announces two things: first, that it has reduced the prices of goods worldwide to 1/1,000,000 of their original value, and second, that Yuuto’s personal funds remain unaffected by this change.

In a world where prices have plummeted to a fraction of their original cost, Yuuto suddenly finds himself unimaginably wealthy. As he uses his newfound fortune to help those around him, the system begins to issue specific missions for him to complete. While adapting to his new status and lifestyle, Yuuto gradually starts to think about the long-term impact of his wealth and resources, pondering how best to use them to shape the future.

altTitles.ja: くちびるから愛

description.en: Riku, a beloved handyman known throughout the town, struggles with crowds due to his sensitive ears.After failing his entrance exams for that very reason, the one who supported him was his high school friend, Sumiharu.Despite being busy running his own business, Riku found comfort in Sumiharu's companionship. However, oneway, during an ordinary phone call, Riku unexpectedly felt aroused just from hearing Sumiharu's voice.Confused by this sudden change in his feelings, Riku begins to notice that the physical closeness between him and Sumiharu is steadily increasing. What could this mean for their relationship?

title.en: That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch

altTitles.zh: 关于被班上绿茶威胁那件事

altTitles.zh-ro: Guānyú bèi bān shàng lǜchá wēixié nà jiàn shì

altTitles.zh-hk: 關於被班上綠茶威脅那件事

altTitles.fr: La fois où la garce manipulatrice [garce au thé vert] de ma classe m'a fait chanter

description.en:
Green Tea Bitch (n.): A woman who pretends to be pure and innocent but is in fact manipulative and calculating.

When school ends, a good honor student is threatened by the class's green tea bitch.
"I never thought a wide-eyed goody-two-shoes like you would get up to something like that."
"If you don't want me to expose your shameful secret..."

A cute romance that stems from a misunderstanding begins in *That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch*!

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.en: I'm a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped into a Gyaru

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um Garoto do Ensino médio, mas troquei de Gênero e Me Tornei uma Gal

description.en:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja: 陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
description.pt-br:
Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

altTitles.ja: 無敵の人

altTitles.ja-ro: Muteki no Hito

description.en: It is said that there is no such thing as an "undefeated" player in mahjong due to the large element of luck. However, an undefeated player suddenly appears on Japan's largest online mahjong site, Jansen! His name is "M," and in order to find out if M is cheating, Sonokawa Junpei, a poor part-time worker, approaches him under the guise of a fake friendship. However, when he discovers the secret of M's strength, he begins to develop a passionate friendship with him... The tale of mahjong friendship that challenges the wall of undefeatedness begins!

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Koto ga Daidaidaidaidaisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho
Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.it: Le 100 fidanzate che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto
Le 100 ragazze che ti amano tanto tanto tanto tanto tanto

altTitles.es: Mis 100 Novias Que Me Quieren Mogollón Mogollón

description.en: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.es:
Rentaro Aijou es una máquina de declararse y de recibir calabazas, consiguiendo la cifra de 100 rechazos al final de la secundaria. Roto por dentro, va a rezar a un santuario de suerte en el amor para pedir que la fortuna le sonría. Para su sorpresa, el dios del santuario se le aparece y le promete que conocerá a 100 almas gemelas durante el bachillerato.

Aunque al principio cree que le ha tomado el pelo, el primer día de clase se le declaran dos chicas en cuanto lo conocen, así que ve que sus rezos funcionaron y la cosa pinta bien. Sin embargo, hay un pequeño detalle que el dios no le explicó: si alguna de estas almas gemelas no consigue establecer una relación con él, esa chica morirá. Su gran corazón hace que no pueda permitir que eso suceda en ningún caso y por eso, ¡decide que saldrá con todas ellas!

¡Su nueva e inesperada vida de bachillerato, llena de amor, confusiones y un montón de chicas, le depara una sorpresa tras otra!

(Fuente: Editorial Ivrea)
description.ja: 「好き」っていいたい！いわれたい！中学卒業式に100回目の失恋をした愛城恋太郎は、高校でこそ初めての彼女を！と願う。そんな彼の前に現れた恋の神様が告げた未来は「高校生活で出会う“運命の人”は100人。しかし彼女達は、幸せになれなければなんやかんや（中略）あって…死ぬ」　突然始まるDEAD OR LOVEな純愛ハーレムライフ!!　絶対に脱落しない・させない！
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: 水姫先輩の恋占い

altTitles.ja-ro: Mizuki-senpai no Koi Uranai

description.en:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: 異世界チート開拓記

description.en: I was living a life of a NEET, and I was supposed to have died suddenly because of my daily indolence - but when I woke up, I had become a baby. It seems that I was reincarnated in another world where magic exists. I was born the son of a lord in a remote village, and began to lead a second life with my beautiful mother Kara, my big-breasted maid and nanny Ruina, and my beautiful sister Amelia, who is not related to me by blood. As a teenager, I've grown up and enjoy my daily life in a different world using my top-level magical ability and modern knowledge...?
description.ja: ニート生活を送っていた俺は、日頃の不摂生が祟り突然死したはずだった――が、目覚めたら赤ちゃんになっていた。どうやら魔法の存在する異世界に転生したらしい。辺境の村の領主の息子として生まれた俺は、美しい母親のカーラ、巨乳のメイド兼乳母ルイーナ、血の繋がらない美人妹アメリアらに囲まれて第二の人生を歩んでいく。成長した俺は、10代にして異世界トップレベルの魔力量と現代知識を駆使して、異世界での日常を楽しむが……!?
description.pt-br: Eu estava vivendo uma vida de NEET e deveria ter morrido de repente por causa de minha indolência diária - mas quando acordei, havia me tornado um bebê. Parece que reencarnei em outro mundo onde existe magia. Nasci filho de um senhor em uma aldeia remota e comecei a levar uma segunda vida com minha linda mãe Kara, minha empregada de seios grandes e babá Ruina, e minha linda irmã Amelia, que não é parente de mim. Como um adolescente, eu cresci e aproveitei minha vida diária em um mundo diferente usando minha habilidade mágica de nível superior e conhecimento moderno...?

description.en:
“Punching and making each other bleed. How can you call that a sport?”

Hayul, who had been living a boring and stagnant life, goes through a turning point in her life through her friend Hongmin and coach Sangjun. Mixed Martial Arts, it is a sport that has the memories of her dad, but also the one that led Hayul’s dad into death. Hayul grabs her gloves once again, with a plan to get revenge on Johns Alves, the very person that killed her dad.

“Talent above talents, will Hayul ever be able to break through that wall?”

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?
